TopicTitle: How much speed will make during reentry if back from mars?

Articles.Content:
Hello^^

I heard that if you make reentry from moon distant it speed will about 11.2km/s.So I have a question.What if we make reentry from mars.(Like fly back from mars and direct in to earth)

How much speed will make during reentry?
Enough to probably require slowing down first, instead of aerobraking like Apollo. It might be done like with Apollo, but the angle window would be so much smaller... if any.

14.3 km/s if I read this correctly.

http://www.phy6.org/stargaze/Smars3.htm
